attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The governmet whants bright intelligent people to work for the country and contribute to the UKs economy. 

Students today cannot afford to go through university due to huge student loans they have to take out in order to pay off their tuition fees.

Many students drop out of the education ladder after leaving sixth form or college and look towards getting a job or apprenticeship.
This is because of the large fees. 

Further more, once students leave university with lingering fees and loans to pay off, it is extreamly hard to get on the property ladder and causes many young men and women problems in their early life.

Take a leaf out of Scotlands book and help our youth to get degrees and secure the future of the country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
